name: SD Count Per Day Overview
author: Sverigedemokraterna IT

sections.description:
Provides an overview of visitor statistics for all blogs, using Count Per Day. Requires that Thomas Braider’s Count Per Day plugin is installed.

The data table is refreshed automatically after the table data becomes too old and can also be manually refreshed by the network admin.

Available in:

  • English
  • Swedish
sections.installation:
1. Unzip and copy the zip contents (including directory) into the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin sitewide through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.
sections.changelog:
1.2

  • Blog visitor counts are collected also.

1.1

  • Admin has choice to set up how often the data is collected.

1.0

  • Initial public release
